programme.title: O Garoto Formiga 2 - A Vingança da Fúria Vermelha, (2016, Children)

programme.title: Pequenos Espiões 4, (2011, Children)
programme.desc: Marisa Cortez Wilson é casada com Wilbur, um repórter conhecido por desmascarar espiões, e com ele tem um bebê e duas crianças. O que o marido não sabe é que a esposa é uma ex-espiã, que decidiu largar a carreira para se dedicar à família.

programme.title: Missão Quase Impossível, (2010, Late Night Comedies)
programme.desc: Ex-C.I.A. espião Bob Ho assume sua tarefa mais difícil até hoje: cuidar dos três filhos de sua namorada, que não gostaram muito do namorado de sua mãe.

programme.title: As Tartarugas Ninja 2: O Segredo do Ooze, (1993, Adventure)
programme.desc: Tartarugas Ninja buscam novo lar nos esgotos de Nova York e enfrentam o Destruidor, que usa o Ooze para criar capangas. Com ajuda de April, Jordan e Keno, precisam detê-lo.

programme.title: Espião por Acaso, (2020, Children)
programme.desc: História verídica sobre o jogo de gato e rato entre o FBI tentando encontrar um espião soviético em suas fileiras e Robert Hanssen, um dos principais agentes do FBI e o provavel espião.

programme.title: A Bruxa do Cabelo Branco do Reino Lunar, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: História de dois amantes, a bruxa de cabelos brancos e o líder taoísta Zhuo Yihang e seu amor que pode mudar o destino da nação.

programme.title: Máscara Negra, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: O sobrevivente de um projeto para criar super soldados deve lutar contra seus ex-companheiros como um herói mascarado.

programme.title: O Vingador Marcial, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de matar um adversário em uma luta clandestina, um campeão de artes marciais e MMA vê sua vida virar de cabeça para baixo quando uma gangue rival, em busca de vingança, mata sua esposa durante um ataque de vingança.

programme.title: O Duelo Final, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Uma ex-lutadora relutantemente retorna à vida que ela abandonou para ajudar sua irmã a sobreviver ao mundo sádico das lutas ilegais e do maníaco que o comanda.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caçador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresário em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Perseguição Explosiva, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Um dublê se envolve acidentalmente em crimes envolvendo relíquias misteriosas e agora precisa lutar para sobreviver ao longo de uma série de aventuras perigosas e incríveis.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Karatê Girl, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Uma estudante do ensino médio no Japão que é uma estudante de karatê arrogante, mas magistral, torna-se feroz quando se junta a uma equipe disfarçada de lutadores.

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família.

programme.title: Retroceder Nunca, Render-se Jamais, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Jason Stillwell é um fã de Bruce Lee e jovem aprendiz de artes marciais. Após seu pai negar participar de uma gangue de criminosos, eles se mudam de cidade, onde Jason encontrará problemas.

programme.title: Juiz Arqueiro, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um homem, que é encarregado de resolver algumas discuptas entre academinas rivais de artes marciais fica dividido. Ele não sabe se escolhe cumprir o dever do que lhe foi delegado ou se vinga a horna de sua família.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: Woman in Green (in Color), (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: Four women are brutally murdered, and Scotland Yard thinks it is the random work of a madman. In Vibrant Color!

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes Terror By Night (in color), (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: A murder mystery set on a speeding train, Holmes guards the transport of the 400-carat diamond. In Vibrant Color!

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: Dressed to Kill, (1946, Thriller)
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes sets out to discover why a trio of murderous villains, including a dangerously attractive female, are desperate to obtain three unassuming and inexpensive little music boxes.

programme.title: A Study in Scarlet, (1933, Thriller)
programme.desc: In London, a secret society collects the assets of any of its deceased members and divides them among the remaining members. Sherlock Holmes is approached by member James Murphy's widow, who is miffed at being left penniless by her husband.

programme.title: Battle of Britain, (1969, War)
programme.desc: A stellar cast, including Michael Caine, Laurence Olivier and Christopher Plummer highlights this epic telling of the greatest air battle in history, when the outnumbered Royal Air Force defeated the German Luftwaffe, saving England from invasion.

programme.title: The Life And Death Of Colonel Blimp, (1943, Drama)
programme.desc: From the Boer War through World War II, a soldier rises through the ranks in the British military.

programme.title: Black Narcissus, (1947, Drama)
programme.desc: A group of nuns struggle to establish a convent in the Himalayas, while isolation, extreme weather, altitude, and culture clashes all conspire to drive the well-intentioned missionaries mad.

programme.title: The Red Shoes, (1948, Drama)
programme.desc: A young ballet dancer is torn between the man she loves and her pursuit to become a prima ballerina.

programme.title: When Worlds Collide, (1951, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy)
programme.desc: An impending collision with a runaway star signals the destruction of Earth. As doomsday approaches, people race against time and the panic of those who will be left behind.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: Assault On Va-33, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Sean Patrick Flanery (The Boondock Saints) stars as Army Veteran Jason Hill. While on a VA hospital visit, terrorists infiltrate the building and take hostages. Hill is now outnumbered and the last line of defense against the armed insurgents.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: Vantage Point, (2008, Thriller)

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: Scream, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths, an offbeat group of scary movie fans become the target of a masked killer in this smash-hit thriller from legendary director Wes Craven (A NIGHTMARE ON ELM STREET) that breathed new life into the horror genre.

programme.title: True Grit, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: True Grit is a powerful story of vengeance and valor set in an unforgiving and unpredictable frontier where justice is simple and mercy is rare.

programme.title: Young Guns, (1988, Western)
programme.desc: In a lawless and violent time, six young outcasts are hired by an English merchant as 'regulators' to guard his ranch against the mob, a corrupt and powerful ring.

programme.title: Alex Rider: Operation Stormbreaker, (2006, Espionage Action)

programme.title: The Spirit, (2008, Action)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa's soul as his prize!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister's eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi's deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they've ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he's to survive!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil's first wave of Duel Monsters, he's shocked to discover that Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai's secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp's crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba's brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother's company!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba, created from the greed and power lust Yugi wiped from Kaiba's soul.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi defeats the Blue Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends' help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: the Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring's dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?
programme.sub-title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Zoro, Sanji, and Kin'emon strike off in search of the thieving fairy who has taken Zoro's sword, but Sanji finds himself mesmerized by the beautiful dancing of a gorgeous Dressrosa woman - with a deadly secret!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Dangerous Love! The Dancer Girl - Violet!

programme.title: Luffy enters the Corrida Colosseum in order to compete for Ace's Flare-Flare Fruit! But with the mightiest warriors of the New World assembled and standing in his way, the competition will not be easy. The first stage of the competition is a battle royal.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Formidable, Unknown Warrior! Here Comes Lucy!

programme.title: While the deadly battle of Block A winds down, all the onlookers in the stadium are shocked to discover the secret identity of the winner! Meanwhile, Luffy's cover may be blown as another voice from the past returns.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy meets an unexpected acquaintance from the past, Bellamy, who seems to be up to no good! Meanwhile, Caesar Handover Team encounters a snag when they learn just how dangerous Green Bit is!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fateful Reunion! Bellamy the Hyena!

programme.title: The battle heats up and the widely despised Bartolomeo takes the ring! But he'll have to contend with both the Prodence Kingdom contingent, and Dressrosa's own local favorite, Bellamy! From up above, Luffy risks having his cover blown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Super Rookie! Bartolomeo the Cannibal!

programme.title: Don Chinjao continues to provoke Luffy, hoping to gain revenge against the grandson of his sworn enemy, Garp! But as the argument continues, Luffy risks having his cover blown, and his identity revealed! Meanwhile, the battle in Block B rages.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big Names Duke It Out! The Heated Block B Battle!

programme.title: The battle for Block B hits a crescendo as King Elizabello II prepares his devastating King Punch! But as the powerful attack becomes imminent, the Prodence Kingdom faction unravels! All that may be pointless, though.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Blow! The Astonishing King Punch!

programme.title: As the handover team approaches Green Bit, they are attacked by the fearsome fish that live off the coast of Dressrosa. But that's the least of their problems as they find the bridge to Green Bit has collapsed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fighting Fish Strike! Across the Deadly Iron Bridge!

programme.title: Zoro tracks the thief who stole his sword - and learns about a danger facing the Straw Hats! Meanwhile, Law, Usopp, and the others arrive at Green Bit only to find it inhabited by strange creatures, and swarming with the Navy soldiers!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: All but done for, Sanji is trapped by Violet and her crew when she suddenly changes her mind and mysteriously turns on her own men! Meanwhile, Robin and Usopp come face to face with the Little People known as the Tontatta Tribe.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Unknown World! The Tontatta Kingdom!

programme.title: Sanji gets in touch with Law in order to share a shocking secret - that could unsettle the Straw Hats' plans in Dressrosa for good! Meanwhile, Luffy's Block C battle begins, but will his Gum-Gum powers give him away?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Stratagem of the Century! Doflamingo Makes His Move!

programme.title: Sanji and Franky try to regroup after Doflamingo's betrayal, hoping that destroying the factory is not yet out of their grasp. Meanwhile Luffy makes a friend in the Colosseum and Usopp ends up thrust into an uncomfortable position!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shaking Heaven and Earth! Admiral Fujitora's Power!

programme.title: The Sunny is mysteriously deformed by the bizarre powers of Giolla! Can Nami, Chopper, and Brook act in time to save their beloved home? Meanwhile, the battle for Block C continues as Luffy suffers a staggering setback.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Blow of Anger! A Giant vs. Lucy!

programme.title: After knocking down the Giant, Hajrudin, as payback for what he did to Ucy, Luffy has to deal with Ideo, whose punch has the destructive force of a bomb, while the Funk Brothers show off their bizarre fighting technique.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Destruction Cannon Blasts! Lucy in Trouble!

programme.title: Nami, Chopper, and Brooke keep trying to evade Jora and win back the Sunny even though it's been turned into a piece of art! In the Colosseum, Don Chin Jao finally faces Luffy - whose power will prove greater?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legendary Pirate! Don Chin Jao!

programme.title: Luffy stands along against Don Chinjao, and learns about the old grudge he bears against Garp! Meanwhile, Usopp and Robin get swept up in the Tontatta Kingdom's raid against the royal family, and Franky learns the eerie secret of Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Light and Shadow! Darkness behind Dressrosa!

programme.title: The Tontatta Kingdom gears up for its all-out assault on the Doflamingo Family, as Usopp and Robin are caught up in the war effort! Meanwhile, Franky arrives the headquarters of the toy movement where he finds Zoro, Nami & the others are cornered by Jora.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Making a Sortie! The Legendary Hero Usoland!

programme.title: Don Chin Jao's hatred of Garp and Luffy is finally explained, while his battle against Luffy comes to an end. With tremendous power, one of them is squarely eliminated! But is that really the end of the Colosseum battle?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fierce Battle Coming to the End! Lucy vs. Chin Jao!

programme.title: With the battle with Don Chinjao long behind him, Luffy advances to the final round! Block-D contender Cavendish, however, takes the chance and pounces on Luffy, who is defended by an unlikely ally! The agenda of Colosseum gladiator Rebecca is exposed.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy and the Gladiator of Fate - Rebecca!

programme.title: Rebecca's deep bonds with the one-legged toy soldier are revealed! Her lineage can be traced to the previous ruler of Dressrosa - and her eternal bond with the damaged toy is linked to the violent overthrow of that regime by none other than Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect You to the End! Rebecca and the Toy Soldier!

programme.title: As Rebecca enters the ring for the battle for Block D, the crowd shows its contempt for her heritage - only to be scolded by an unlikely supporter. Meanwhile, the other Straw Hats start to reassemble to deal with the attack on the Sunny.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Last - and Bloodiest - Block! Block D Battle Begins!

programme.title: Doflamingo recounts for Law the surprising history of the Don Quixote Family, while Nami and the others battle the insane and powerful artist, Giolla! Her ultimate attack renders them incapacitated, and prompts the betrayal of one of their closest allies!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Decisive Battle! Giolla vs. the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Law is pinned by Fujitora, and Doflamingo has the upper hand! Only the most cunning of tricks could save Law's plan to hand Caesar over to Nami & the others! Meanwhile, the Sunny falls into danger again, & the battle for Block D heats up in the Colosseum.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Beautiful Sword! Cavendish of the White Horse!

programme.title: Law must put himself in harm's way to defend the Sunny and the Straw Hats from Doflamingo's all-out assault! With barely enough time to save the crew, plans change and send the Sunny on a new mission -- but will it be able to get underway?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Clash! Sanji vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Law & Doflamingo are embroiled in a heated showdown which triggers Momonosuke's memories of Doflamingo's cruelty from the first time they met; meanwhile, after a tearful fanboy conversation Zoro finally gets to see Luffy but all eyes are fixed on Rebecca.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rebecca's Special Attack! Last-Ditch Sword Dance!

programme.title: Bartolomeo searches the Colosseum for Luffy but stumbles upon the medical center for the losers of the battles in the ring, but is everything at this center as it seems? Meanwhile, Rebecca has to fend off Rolling Logan's vicious bone-crushing grip attack.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Most Violent Fighter! Logan vs. Rebecca!

programme.title: The losers of the Colosseum battle who are being held below the infirmary have a surprising person in their midst! But do they have a clue as to their terrifying fate? Meanwhile, the Tontatta Kingdom's history is made clear.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Surprise! The True Identity of the Toy Soldier!

programme.title: Bartolomeo finally finds Luffy and starts to lead him to Zoro, while the toy soldier begins to tell the heart-breaking story of how Doflamingo cheated the Riku dynasty out of their control of Dressrosa!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Horrible Past! The Secret of Dressrosa!

programme.title: As the toy soldier's story continues, the sad fate of King Riku and his army, and his daughter Princess Viola, is revealed as well as how the people of Dressrosa fell into the hands of Doflamingo. And all the toys in the country share a mysterious secret.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Nightmare! The Tragic Night of Dressrosa!

programme.title: Zoro, Kin'emon, and Luffy are reunited again, but little do they know that their reunion is being monitored by a potential threat! Meanwhile, the battle rages on between Doflamingo and Law as these two powerhouses clash.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Showdown Between the Warlords! Law vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Zoro and Kin'emon make a mad dash to save Law but Navy Admiral Fujitora stands in their way, bringing his full power against them. The Navy is in hot pursuit as a ship approaches with unexpected visitors from the past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Two Great Rivals Meet Each Other! Straw Hat and Heavenly Demon!

programme.title: After revealing the horrible history of Dressrosa, Toy Soldier now shares their plan to liberate the Tontatta Kingdom and bring down the Doflamingo Family, Operation SOP. Luffy bumps into a heavily-wounded Bellamy and Bartolomeo
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Astonished! The Man Who Inherits Ace's Will!

programme.title: Usopp and Robin make their way via an underground tunnel dug by the tiny people of the Tontatta Tribe - a tunnel so small in fact, that Franky couldn't fit! Instead, Franky makes his way to the Toy House.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Operation SOP Starts! Usoland Charges Forth!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A fortune-teller supposedly able to predict his clients' deaths is for some reason seeking out Lupin's prior victims and giving them some very disturbing readings. What's the connection to Fujiko Mine, and how far will she go to see this job through?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Magical realism plus human trafficking plus Lupin and Daisuke Jigen plus a spa vacation plus Fujiko off the deep end equals... Well, you'll just have to find out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Count Almeida has a job for Lupin, and he's not about to take no for an answer. When Lupin and Zenigata both separately make their way to the Count's villa seeking answers, the trail of clues leads to a ghost town with just one inhabitant.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A recent string of particularly flashy thefts has been tied to Fujiko Mine, who seems to have taken to sending written warnings to the police just like Lupin does. But if you ask Inspector Zenigata, something smells fishy about the whole thing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Oscar's body is missing, girls are being kidnapped all over the world, and Lupin still hasn't made good on his threat to steal Fujiko Mine. There's only one thing to do: It's time to pay a visit to one Count Luís Yu Almeida.
programme.sub-title: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine ( Part 1)

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: In the season finale, all the players have finally come together, and it's time to see how the tale ends.
programme.sub-title: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine ( Part 2)

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Good-Bye Partner"
programme.desc: When Zenigata is arrested for suspicion of being part of the Lupin gang, Lupin is talked into stealing Time Crystal to prove Pops' innocence.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Blood Seal of the Eternal Mermaid"
programme.desc: The Mermaid's Scale is a mysterious aquamarine gemstone that Lupin has been hired to steal it... but it turns out to be a forgery. Now, he needs to find the real jewel before it can be used to destroy the whole world!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Prison Of The Past"
programme.desc: When the Lupin gang hears the news that Finnegan Corbett, fondly referred to the 'Modern Day Robin Hood', is finally set to be executed, they travel to Kingdom of Dorrente to break him loose…

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Green vs. Red"
programme.desc: If Lupin is stealing something in one place, how can he be shoplifting in another place? One Lupin wears red; the other wears green. In the final standoff, whose side will Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko choose?

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Italian Game"
programme.desc: The stage is set in Italy. Rebecca has been kidnapped! She belongs to one of the most prominent families in the Republic of San Marino and the young woman is the CEO of the Rossellini conglomerate which operates the largest chain of hotels in Italy.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "The Secret Of Mamo"
programme.desc: The world's most wanted master thief, Lupin III is dead! Despite a coroner's report, Interpol Inspector Zenigata is skeptical and discovers that Lupin is actually alive and well and stealing! But who had set up Lupin's death and why?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: The Hida Speedway has been completed and Lupin is looking to take top prize at the first race. The race is actually a trap designed by the Scorpion Gang who are intent on killing Lupin and eliminating all criminal competition.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko has stolen something from a man named Pycal, and he wants it back. Pycal is a magician who is able to shoot flames from his hands, walk on air, and deflect bullets with ease. Lupin goes up against Pycal in hopes of saving Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: The Man They Called a Magician

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A boat collision ruins Lupin and Fujiko's quiet boating expedition. They discover a woman named Linda in the other boat just as gunmen on a larger boat attack them.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Virtuosity, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: He’s a composite of some 200 personalities, each and every one a notorious killer. He’s Sid 6.7, a virtual reality creation designed to put L.A. police officers to the test.

programme.title: Overlord, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Nothing can prepare you for the mind-blowing mayhem that is Overlord. Mega producer J.J. Abrams creates an insanely twisted thrill ride about a team of American troops who come face-to-face with Nazi super-soldiers unlike the world has ever seen.

programme.title: World War Z, (2013, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: Automata, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jacq Vaucan (Antonio Banderas, 'The Mask of Zorro') is an insurance agent of ROC robotics corporation who investigates cases of robots violating their primary protocols against altering themselves.

programme.title: Virtuosity, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: He’s a composite of some 200 personalities, each and every one a notorious killer. He’s Sid 6.7, a virtual reality creation designed to put L.A. police officers to the test.

programme.title: Overlord, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Nothing can prepare you for the mind-blowing mayhem that is Overlord. Mega producer J.J. Abrams creates an insanely twisted thrill ride about a team of American troops who come face-to-face with Nazi super-soldiers unlike the world has ever seen.

programme.title: World War Z, (2013, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: Sam Whiskey, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: Welcome to America's Wild - and very wacky - West! Burt Reynolds, Clint Walker, Ossie Davis and Angie Dickinson star in this tongue-in-cheek tale of love, lust and larceny as an amiable con-artist is hire by a sexy widow to break into the U.S. Mint.

programme.title: Back In The Saddle, (1941, Drama)
programme.desc: When pollution poisons hundreds of cattle, Gene Autry, faces trouble from all sides. Originally released in 1941, this film features Gene's signature song and his lovable sidekick, Smiley Burnette.

programme.title: Heart Of The Rio Grande, (1942, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry tames a spoiled teenage shrew sent to a Dude Ranch for the summer and in the process humanizes her father into being a better parent. Action includes stampeding horses, and a bold rescue!

programme.title: Blood On The Arrow, (1964, Drama)
programme.desc: In 1871 Arizona, an escaped outlaw survives an Indian attack and helps a trading-post family retrieve their kidnapped son from marauding Apaches.

programme.title: Gunsight Ridge, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: Stage line agent investigates a series of robberies by taking the job of a deputy sheriff in a border Arizona town.

programme.title: Billy Two Hats, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: Archie (Gregory Peck) and his partner, Billy (Desi Arnaz, Jr.) are bandits by trade, staging daring robberies throughout the American frontier. But when their latest heist takes a deadly turn, they are pursued by a ruthless marshal (Jack Warden).

programme.title: God Forgives, I Don't, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: A fast-shooting gunman and an insurance agent track down the murdering robbers of a train hijacking and the stolen money.

programme.title: Doc, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: Stacy Keach, Haris Yulin, and Faye Dunaway give riveting performances in this controversial and myth-shattering reexamination of the darker side of gunslinger Doc Holliday and the actions that led to the infamous showdown in Tombstone, Arizona.

programme.title: The Gunfighter, (1950, Drama)
programme.desc: A retired gunslinger is forced to strap on his six-shooters once again by the vengeful brothers of a man he killed in self-defense.

programme.title: Big Jake, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: An aging Texas cattle man who has outlived his time swings into action when outlaws kidnap his grandson and wound his son.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: In 1965, America is at war with North Vietnam and Lt. Col. Hal Moore prepares his troops for one of the most violent battles in U.S. History: “The Valley of Death”.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: Colonel Terry Childers is a patriot and war hero. But when a peacekeeping mission he leads in Yemen goes terribly wrong, he finds himself facing a court-martial.

programme.title: Basic, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: A former Army Ranger, now working as a DEA agent, is called in to investigate the disappearance of a drill sergeant and several cadets during a training mission that went disastrously wrong in the Panamanian jungle.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: In 1965, America is at war with North Vietnam and Lt. Col. Hal Moore prepares his troops for one of the most violent battles in U.S. History: “The Valley of Death”.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: Colonel Terry Childers is a patriot and war hero. But when a peacekeeping mission he leads in Yemen goes terribly wrong, he finds himself facing a court-martial.

programme.title: Basic, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: A former Army Ranger, now working as a DEA agent, is called in to investigate the disappearance of a drill sergeant and several cadets during a training mission that went disastrously wrong in the Panamanian jungle.

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: From three-time Oscar-winning director Steven Spielberg, Catch Me If You Can follows Frank W. Abagnale, Jr. as he successfully passes himself off as a pilot, a lawyer, and a doctor - all before his 21st birthday!

programme.title: Realizing they are outgunned, Rick leads an expedition to get more weapons and fortify their group against the Governor and his forces.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Rick and the Governor convene for a tense negotiation of a peace treaty between their respective groups, hoping to prevent more deaths.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Governor chases a fleeing dissenter; while the Governor is gone, a traitor tries to sabotage his plans.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The group lives a more peaceful life at the prison and strives to hold onto humanity; problems arise when Rick encounters a new survivor.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Facing a new enemy, Rick abandons his quiet lifestyle so that he and the others can fight to protect their hard-won livelihood.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: A group leaves the prison to search for supplies; the remaining members of the group deal with recent losses.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl and a small group set out on foot in search of medicine, but their mission faces obstacles; Rick and Carol find two uninfected stragglers in a nearby town.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Assorted enemies pressure Rick and the group; the survivors and the prison may reach a breaking point.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Following his defeat at Woodbury, the Governor wanders aimlessly until he encounters a family in need.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: At the camp outside the prison, the addition of new members threatens the peace; something new unfolds as the Governor plans his next move.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Things finally begin to calm at the prison until Rick and the group face imminent danger when the Governor arrives with his forces.
